title: Global Account Director
review: Imagine the power of going into salary negotiations for a role... and you already know how much someone on that team makes. Transparency is how I'm helping to close the gap.

title: Business & Implementation Arch Analyst
review: The process to apply to Accenture was amazing after connecting with a fellow Latina in Tech. I am still in the process of negotiating a relocation package with my recruiter.

title: Software Engineer
review: Work/life balance. What balance? All those perks and benefits are an illusion. They keep you at work and they help you to be more productive.

title: Software Engineer
review: Extremely dysfunctional leadership (everyone is trying to not ruffle the feathers to collect their juicy paycheck)

title: Software Engineer
review: I amm still a bit new, but I have very good impressions so far. I have 10 years exp at 5+ other companies (although no other tech companies) and this is the best by a good margin.

title: Software Engineer
review: I believe I can make more money elsewhere as a software engineer. However, the people here are nice enough.

title: Customer Service Representative
review: Good pay and good mentors here to teach us. However, people are often let go for no good reason.

title: Software Engineer
review: Great benefits, excellent bonus structure, and lots of perks.

title: Software Engineer
review: Extremely fast paced due to continuous growth. However, there are great benefits to working at Salesforce.
